text: Baram te'om, yijane prathame srstira sucana karaiche, tara pichata teraemi iyara punaraabrtti karaiba arau teraemi akasa arau prthiraira paraa tomalokaka jiranopakarana dana karae. (Tente koraacona) allahara lagata ana kono ilaha achene? Koraa, ‘yadi tomaloke satyabadi tente tomalokara pramana lai aha’
